title: Partnering with Your Spouse During Parenting Challenges
itunes:summary:
John and Danny offer tips to help you and your spouse develop a consistent, united parenting strategy. Featuring Pastor Bill Putman and Pastor Jim Putman. Find us online at focusonthefamily.com/parentingpodcast. Or, call 1-800-A-FAMILY.

Hope for the Prodigal: https://donate.focusonthefamily.com/don-fofp-podcast-2020-11-10?refcd=1013602

Get More Episode Resources: https://focusonthefamily.com/episodes/focus-on-parenting-podcast/partnering-with-your-spouse-during-parenting-challenges/#featured-resource-cta

If you've listened to any of our podcasts, please give us your feedback: focusonthefamily.com/podcastsurvey
